plot: Highly stylized and hypnotically shot RATS pushes the art of documentary filmmaking to the limit. From homeless philosophers to urban rat snipers RATS will take you on an emotional roller coaster ride you won't forget.
title: Rats
plot_es: Highly stylized and hypnotically shot RATS pushes the art of documentary filmmaking to the limit. From homeless philosophers to urban rat snipers RATS will take you on an emotional roller coaster ride you won't forget.
plot_en: Highly stylized and hypnotically shot RATS pushes the art of documentary filmmaking to the limit. From homeless philosophers to urban rat snipers RATS will take you on an emotional roller coaster ride you won't forget.
